Requests are currently open! icon is our mascot, McMuffins, and he was drawn by @trriton! mods are Admin Pikachu, Mod Bulbasaur and Mod Mudkip.
☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
This is an LGBT blog for Pokémon fans and Pokemonkin run by Pokémon fans! Send in headcanons, icon requests, stimboard requests, moodboard requests or requests for name + pronoun validation! Feel free to tag any post as kin/me/ID/etc unless specified otherwise!

summary: You are challenged by Elite Four Clea! [Before battle] “Hello, small human! I am Clea of the Elite Four, and I come from another...
caption:
You are challenged by Elite Four Clea!

[Before battle] “Hello, small human! I am Clea of the Elite Four, and I come from another dimension… the Dark Dimension! ‘Impossible’, you say? Nothing is impossible here, darling!”

[After being defeated] “I told you, nothing is impossible, even to defeat me! Now go ahead, my beloved Stephen awaits for you in the Champion’s room. Always look for the light in the darkness, small human, it can be your chance to win… even when the hope seems lost!”

💜 Absol (can Megaevolve): A dark Pokemon with snow white fur… exactly like Clea, who comes from a world of darkness, but her hair is bright white. 💜 Umbreon: The perfect Eeveelution for Clea, his Yellow circles remind of Clea’s circled stockings. 💜 Houndoom: The Flames of the Faltine is one of the most powerful fire spell in the Marvel mystic world and are also the crown of the Dark Dimension, that’s why she HAD to own a fire Pokemon 💜 Malamar: other than having almost the same color palette as Clea, Malamar reminds also the constant presence of tentacles in the Doctor Strange comics, and has a very alien-ish look. 💜 Liepard: Elegant, feminine and playful, Liepard has also a circled pattern on its purple fur… no way this is a perfect Pokemon for Clea! 💜 Spiritomb: another purple Pokemon with circles in it… Spiritomb reminds also the flaming face of Dormammu, Clea’s evil uncle!

All the Pokèmon artworks I used are the original by Ken Sugimori, I’ve drawn only Clea.

You are challenged by Elite Four Clea!

First pokemon fusion, Sceptile + Charizard!

 I had a lot of fun with this one actually, even if...

summary:
Pokémon #51 - Dugtrio | Height: 2.3 Feet | Weight: 73.4 lbs
Mole Pokémon
 Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one...
caption:
Pokémon #51 - Dugtrio | Height: 2.3 Feet | Weight: 73.4 lbs

Mole Pokémon

Dugtrio are actually triplets that emerged from one body. As a result, each triplet thinks exactly like the other two triplets. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly.

blog.name: inikavulpixelreviews
blog.title: Let's Talk About Pokemon!
blog.description:
Reviewing my personal opinion on every single Pokemon! Yes, all 809 of them!
(Mostly) Daily Uploads, 3 PM EST.

summary: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Archen and Archeops
title: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Archen and Archeops
body:
566: Archen

As far as Gen 5’s Fossil Pokemon go, Archen ends up stealing the show from the rather normal looking Carracosta. While I did say Carracosta looks like something that’d be living in prehistoric times, it does also have the general aesthetic of Rock Types, so it’d end up also passing as something walking around in the modern day. Now Archen. THIS is a friggin prehistoric creature, without a doubt.

This adorable little birdosaur, as the name would imply, is based on the Archaeopteryx. An animal previously cited as a missing link between dinosaurs and modern-day birds. Though of course, we now know that dinosaurs were birds the entire time, and that modern birds are still dinosaurs, and will one day exact revenge on mammals by taking over the earth once more.

But in any case, Archen is a great design given its basis. I love that it’s presented as something that’s yet to be able to fly, that’s just cute. And it’s just so cute and colorful, given its basis. Look at it! Look at it!!!

Personal Score: 9/10

All birds across time are my friends

567: Archeops

And Archeops is just about as every little bit as good as Archen is too. While not as cute, it’s definitely a cool, menacing flying, feathered lizard looking wickedly colorful and plenty mean. And I’m just glad it didn’t take too long to get some feathered dinosaurs in on this Fossil Pokemon schtick. At least as far as this age where they’ve turned to just make dinosaurs goes. And not only that, but I also appreciate that it’s just as cool and extravagant-looking as the real thing. Or at least what we perceive it to look like.

Personal Score: 9/10

Looking at you, certain other avious Fossilmon.

Overall:

Good birds. Good dinosaurs. Good lizards. Good Dinozirds.

[Archive]

[[MORE]]

All birds across time are my friends

567: Archeops

And Archeops is just about as every little bit as good as Archen is too. While not as cute, it’s definitely a cool, menacing flying, feathered lizard looking wickedly colorful and plenty mean. And I’m just glad it didn’t take too long to get some feathered dinosaurs in on this Fossil Pokemon schtick. At least as far as this age where they’ve turned to just make dinosaurs goes. And not only that, but I also appreciate that it’s just as cool and extravagant-looking as the real thing. Or at least what we perceive it to look like.

Personal Score: 9/10

Looking at you, certain other avious Fossilmon.

Overall:

Good birds. Good dinosaurs. Good lizards. Good Dinozirds.

[Archive]
